mn148:1.2: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn148:2.1: “dhammaṁ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pakāsessāmi, yadidaṁ—
mn148:2.3: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
mn148:2.4: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
mn148:3.1: “Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbāni, cha bāhirāni āyatanāni veditabbāni, cha viññāṇakāyā veditabbā, cha phassakāyā veditabbā, cha vedanākāyā veditabbā, cha taṇhākāyā veditabbā.
mn148:4.2: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn148:4.3: Cakkhāyatanaṁ, sotāyatanaṁ, ghānāyatanaṁ, jivhāyatanaṁ, kāyāyatanaṁ, manāyatanaṁ.
mn148:4.5: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn148:5.2: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn148:5.3: Rūpāyatanaṁ, saddāyatanaṁ, gandhāyatanaṁ, rasāyatanaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, dhammāyatanaṁ.
mn148:5.5: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn148:6.2: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn148:6.3: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ,
mn148:6.4: sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ,
mn148:6.5: ghānañca paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ,
mn148:6.6: jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṁ,
mn148:6.7: kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ,
mn148:6.8: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ.
mn148:6.10: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn148:7.2: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn148:7.3: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso;
mn148:7.4: sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso;
mn148:7.5: ghānañca paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso;
mn148:7.6: jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso;
mn148:7.7: kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso;
mn148:7.8: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso.
mn148:7.10: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn148:8.2: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn148:8.3: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā;
mn148:8.4: sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā;
mn148:8.5: ghānañca paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā;
mn148:8.6: jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā;
mn148:8.7: kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā;
mn148:8.8: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā.
mn148:8.10: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn148:9.2: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
mn148:9.3: Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā;
mn148:9.4: sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
mn148:9.5: ghānañca paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ …
mn148:9.6: jivhañca paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṁ …
mn148:9.7: kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ …
mn148:9.8: manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā.
mn148:9.10: iti yaṁ taṁ vuttaṁ, idametaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ.
mn148:10.1: ‘Cakkhu attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:10.3: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:10.7: ‘Rūpā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:10.9: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:10.13: ‘Cakkhuviññāṇaṁ attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:10.15: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:10.18: Iti cakkhu anattā, rūpā anattā, cakkhuviññāṇaṁ anattā.
mn148:10.19: ‘Cakkhusamphasso attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:10.21: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:10.24: Iti cakkhu anattā, rūpā anattā, cakkhuviññāṇaṁ anattā, cakkhusamphasso anattā.
mn148:10.25: ‘Vedanā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:10.27: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:10.30: Iti cakkhu anattā, rūpā anattā, cakkhuviññāṇaṁ anattā, cakkhusamphasso anattā, vedanā anattā.
mn148:10.31: ‘Taṇhā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:10.33: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:10.36: Iti cakkhu anattā, rūpā anattā, cakkhuviññāṇaṁ anattā, cakkhusamphasso anattā, vedanā anattā, taṇhā anattā.
mn148:11.5: ‘mano attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:11.7: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:12.1: ‘Dhammā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:12.3: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:13.1: ‘Manoviññāṇaṁ attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:13.3: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:13.6: Iti mano anattā, dhammā anattā, manoviññāṇaṁ anattā.
mn148:14.1: ‘Manosamphasso attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:14.3: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:14.6: Iti mano anattā, dhammā anattā, manoviññāṇaṁ anattā, manosamphasso anattā.
mn148:15.1: ‘Vedanā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:15.3: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:15.6: Iti mano anattā, dhammā anattā, manoviññāṇaṁ anattā, manosamphasso anattā, vedanā anattā.
mn148:15.7: ‘Taṇhā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
mn148:15.9: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
mn148:15.12: Iti mano anattā, dhammā anattā, manoviññāṇaṁ anattā, manosamphasso anattā, vedanā anattā, taṇhā anattā.
mn148:16.1: Ayaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkāyasamudayagāminī paṭipadā—
mn148:16.2: cakkhuṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;
mn148:17-21.1: rūpe ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;
mn148:17-21.2: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;
mn148:17-21.3: cakkhusamphassaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;
mn148:17-21.4: vedanaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;
mn148:17-21.5: taṇhaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;
mn148:17-21.6: sotaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:17-21.7: ghānaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:17-21.8: jivhaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:17-21.9: kāyaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:17-21.10: manaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati, dhamme ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati, manoviññāṇaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati, manosamphassaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati, vedanaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati, taṇhaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:22.1: Ayaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkāyanirodhagāminī paṭipadā—
mn148:22.2: cakkhuṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.1: Rūpe ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.2: Cakkhuviññāṇaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.3: Cakkhusamphassaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.4: Vedanaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.5: Taṇhaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.6: Sotaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:23-27.7: ghānaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:23-27.8: jivhaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:23-27.9: kāyaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
mn148:23-27.10: manaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.11: Dhamme ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.12: Manoviññāṇaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.13: Manosamphassaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.14: Vedanaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:23-27.15: Taṇhaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
mn148:28.1: Cakkhuñca, bhikkhave, paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā.
mn148:28.2: So sukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn148:28.4: Dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṁ kandati sammohaṁ āpajjati.
mn148:28.6: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno tassā vedanāya samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
mn148:28.8: So vata, bhikkhave, sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayaṁ appahāya dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayaṁ appaṭivinodetvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya avijjānusayaṁ asamūhanitvā avijjaṁ appahāya vijjaṁ anuppādetvā diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro bhavissatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
mn148:29-33.1: Sotañca, bhikkhave, paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
mn148:29-33.2: ghānañca, bhikkhave, paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
mn148:29-33.3: jivhañca, bhikkhave, paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṁ …pe…
mn148:29-33.4: kāyañca, bhikkhave, paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
mn148:29-33.5: manañca, bhikkhave, paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā.
mn148:29-33.6: So sukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn148:29-33.8: Dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṁ kandati sammohaṁ āpajjati.
mn148:29-33.10: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno tassā vedanāya samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
mn148:29-33.12: So vata, bhikkhave, sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayaṁ appahāya dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayaṁ appaṭivinodetvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya avijjānusayaṁ asamūhanitvā avijjaṁ appahāya vijjaṁ anuppādetvā diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro bhavissatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
mn148:34.1: Cakkhuñca, bhikkhave, paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā.
mn148:34.2: So sukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn148:34.4: Dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattāḷiṁ kandati na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
mn148:34.6: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno tassā vedanāya samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
mn148:34.8: So vata, bhikkhave, sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayaṁ pahāya dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayaṁ paṭivinodetvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya avijjānusayaṁ samūhanitvā avijjaṁ pahāya vijjaṁ uppādetvā diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro bhavissatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
mn148:35.1: Sotañca, bhikkhave, paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ …pe….
mn148:36.1: Ghānañca, bhikkhave, paṭicca gandhe ca uppajjati ghānaviññāṇaṁ …pe….
mn148:37.1: Jivhañca, bhikkhave, paṭicca rase ca uppajjati jivhāviññāṇaṁ …pe….
mn148:38.1: Kāyañca, bhikkhave, paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe ca uppajjati kāyaviññāṇaṁ …pe….
mn148:39.1: “Manañca, bhikkhave, paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṁ tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā.
mn148:39.2: So sukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno nābhinandati nābhivadati nājjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
mn148:39.4: Dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno na socati na kilamati na paridevati na urattāḷiṁ kandati na sammohaṁ āpajjati.
mn148:39.6: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno tassā vedanāya samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ pajānāti.
mn148:39.8: So vata, bhikkhave, sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayaṁ pahāya dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayaṁ paṭivinodetvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya avijjānusayaṁ samūhanitvā avijjaṁ pahāya vijjaṁ uppādetvā diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro bhavissatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
mn148:40.1: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmiṁ nibbindati, rūpesu nibbindati, cakkhuviññāṇe nibbindati, cakkhusamphasse nibbindati, vedanāya nibbindati, taṇhāya nibbindati.
mn148:41.5: manasmiṁ nibbindati, dhammesu nibbindati, manoviññāṇe nibbindati, manosamphasse nibbindati, vedanāya nibbindati, taṇhāya nibbindati.
mn148:41.6: Nibbindaṁ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
mn148:41.7: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
mn148:41.9: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
mn148:41.10: Imasmiṁ kho pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsūti.
